name: Lucky Dices
description:
Move - Arrows                            End turn - Space Bar

This game was made under 3 days with the usage of the Unity engine!

Gameplay!

The game is a turn-based game where the number of movements you are able to do is decided by your's truly... The Dice!

Picture of the all mighty Dice!

In this game you are playing as a light source, trying to discover all the places in your map.

But beware of those who want your light!

By bringing light to certain places you might awake some danegrous creatures!

These monsters are chasing you until they die, and steal your light!

Luckly they are quite dumb and bump into each other causing their death...

The game ends when you lose all your light, or you discover all the map can offer to you!

Making this game caused a lot of agony to myself and a few of my dorm mates... c:
